mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS, FARMER_CODE, CAREER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, SYSDATE, 'Y')

INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS, FARMER_CODE, CAREER) VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{farmerCode}, #{career})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PHONE = #{phone}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, THUMBNAIL, RECRUIT_YN, COUNT, STATUS, MEM_NO FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, THUMBNAIL, RECRUIT_YN, COUNT, STATUS, MEM_NO FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT PROGRAM_LOCATION, PROGRAM_NAME , PROGRAM_PLAN, HEADCOUNT, SIGN_UP, PROGRAM_NO FROM PROGRAM JOIN MARK ON (PROGRAM.MEM_NO = MARK.MEM_NO) WHERE MARK.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND MARK.BOARD_TYPE = 'P' AND PROGRAM.STATUS = 'Y' AND MARK.STATUS = 1 AND BOARD_NO = PROGRAM.PROGRAM_NO
SELECT MK_CATEGORY, MK_TITLE, MK_PRICE, MK_ENROLLDATE FROM MARKET JOIN MARK M USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = 'T' AND MK_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.STATUS = 1
